Drury: "We make a big deal out of what an experience this was for the kids, but Artemi + Mika + Kreids + other players that had been in the playoffs hadn‚Äôt been in a number of years. They took strides in knowing + seeing what it takes to get this deep into the playoffs."

Drury: "The leadership group did a fantastic job this year - not just the players with the A‚Äôs on their sweaters. You don‚Äôt get to 52 wins and to the Conference Finals without having terrific leadership."

#NYR President + GM Chris Drury: ‚ÄúI couldn‚Äôt be prouder of what our players and coaches accomplished this season. We have a special group in that room. Obviously we‚Äôre disappointed we‚Äôre not playing right now in the Final, but we want to build on this as an organization.‚Äù

"My sister said to me the other day, 'Isn't it so funny that it's New York, of all teams, where it's going to begin for you? Just because you've always loved that city and had a soft spot for #NYR?'"

Jessica Campbell on taking the next step: https://t.co/OogLSSSMFz https://t.co/WmHhHsRj9Y

‚ÄúI‚Äôve had this focus to continue + stay on my path and stay on track to learn, grow + be on top of the game at the pro level, and to make sure I‚Äôm always striving to be the best that I can be so that an opportunity will come - like it has now - and that I‚Äôm ready for it.‚Äù - JC

Full details: https://t.co/JBcNMuMPaW https://t.co/5sV4lkMA9T

And that's how "Shesty, Release Us" was born. https://t.co/BKEgY5qDzX
"You‚Äôve got to take care of yourself, be ready every night and not take a day for granted." -Braden on what he learned this year
Igor on the fans: "I want to say thanks to all #NYR fans and fans everywhere. They helped me so much."

‚ÄúI‚Äôve never felt that kind of energy, even going back to my first few years. The city was always behind us. That was something special. That‚Äôs not going anywhere. We‚Äôll be back.‚Äù - Kreids on the #NYR fans

Artemi on seeing New York rally around #NYR: "Great fans. You can see in New York, all the people with the jerseys on. All the coffee shops making better coffee for us now. üòÖ

"That was a great feeling. Sorry it didn‚Äôt last. We tried to show our best."

Strome: ‚ÄúPlaying for #NYR has been a dream come true. I think this team - I don‚Äôt want to look too big picture because I don‚Äôt want to overlook how this team feels being so close, but it does feel good, in a sense. Not our end goal, but the work done so far feels really good.‚Äù

Frankie: "Playing with Mika on a nightly basis - he‚Äôs one of the most underrated players in the league. When you watch him on a nightly basis, the things he does offensively, things he does defensively, kills penalties, shooter on the PP - he just does everything so well."

Trouba on leadership: "When I was younger I had guys that looked out for me. That‚Äôs part of growing up + being a part of team. You have to lean on the older guys. I care a lot about all of them. It‚Äôs great for me to watch them grow + become the players they‚Äôre becoming."
Ryan Reaves on the #NYR youth: "When I got here, I thought they were really good players. At the end of the year, I thought they were great players. To take those steps in one year is huge."

Copp on being reunited with Trouba: "We‚Äôve won a lot of hockey games together, so it was fun to get in that groove again and that belief in each other and that mentality of no matter what the score is, we feel like we're going to win the game, no matter what."

Coach Gallant on Year 1 in New York: "I was a little scared, to be honest with you. [Laughs] But I loved it. It was great. I loved going to The Garden and playing there. I‚Äôm real happy and looking forward to next year.‚Äù

‚ÄúWe got young kids that are getting older. We have a nice window coming up if everyone keeps developing and playing well. I like the build of our team. I like what I‚Äôm seeing. I‚Äôm real happy with our group.‚Äù - Coach Gallant
Coach Gallant: "I was disappointed after the game, but I wasn't disappointed with the performance we had in the playoffs. We battled right to the end. It will help us in the future."
